original: Bäck, Knut, tonsättare, pianopedagog, Göteborg, f. 22/4/68 i Sthlm av prot:sekr. Chr. B. o. Lina Malmström. G. 97 m. pianopedagog Dagmar Malm. Studiex. 86, stud. piano o. tonsättn. h. bl. a. Rich. Andersson, Emil Sjögren, Joh. Lindegren, H. Barth, M. Bruch. Omfatt. pianopedagog, verks, sed. 96. Musikkritiker i Gbgs-Posten sed. 31. Giv. kammarmusiksoaréer, komp. sång-, pianost. o. körverk. Utg. skr.: Tema m. variation f. piano (95), V. Rydbergs Tomten f. baryton o. ork. (96), sång- o. pianostycken. RVO, LMA.
translated: Bäck, Knut, composer, piano teacher, Gothenburg, b. 22/4/68 in Stockholm to Protestant Secretary Christian B. and Lina Malmström. Married in 1897 to piano teacher Dagmar Malm. Graduated 1886, studied piano and composition with Richard Andersson, Emil Sjögren, Johan Lindegren, H. Barth, and Max Bruch. Engaged in piano teaching and composition since 1896. Musical critic in Gbgs-Posten since 1931. Hosted chamber music soirées, composed vocal, piano, and choral works. Published works include: "Theme with variations for piano" (1895), "V. Rydberg's The Christmas Elf for baritone and orchestra" (1896), vocal and piano pieces. Awarded Royal Order of Vasa, Royal Swedish Academy of Music.

education.issuedCredential: Studied piano and composition with Richard Andersson, Emil Sjögren, Johan Lindegren, H. Barth, and Max Bruch

hasOccupation.name: V. Rydberg's The Christmas Elf for Baritone and Orchestra
